Billy’s Baseball Adventures: Math Lesson 1

Hi friends! I’m so excited to go to my first baseball game today!

My favorite team is the Panthers. Do you have a favorite team?

My Dad told me that the baseball stadium has yummy hotdogs and slurpees. I don’t get to have too many of those, but today will be a treat!

I hope I get to catch a ball or meet a famous baseball player, that would be so cool! Have you ever met someone famous before?

Well, we’re ready to head out now. I’ll let you know who wins and what the final score is!

Great job finishing the quiz! We’re all finished with the baseball game, too. The Panthers WON 8-2! Hooray!
